20 class EstimatedIMUBoxStateManager():
21  def __init__(self, model_names, init_poses=None, sdf=True):
22  """
23  Spawns the IMU model.
24 
25  Arguments
26  ---------
27  `model_names`: `List[str]`
28  The model names for the IMU
29 
30  `init_poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
31  `[Pose(Position xyz, Orientation quaternion)]`
32 
33  `sdf`: `bool`
34  launch from sdf or urdf
35  """
36  self.model_names = model_names
37  self.n = len(model_names)
38  self.sdf = sdf
39  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
40 
41  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
42  if sdf:
43  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
44  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model', SpawnModel)
45  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imubox/model.sdf')
46  self.set_model_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_model_state', SetModelState)
47  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
48  xml_string = f.read().replace('\n', '')
49  else:
50  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model')
51  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model', SpawnModel)
52  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imu.urdf')
53  self.set_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_link_state', SetLinkState)
54  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
55  xml_string = f.read()
56 
57  if init_poses is None:
58  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
59  orientation = Quaternion(q[0], q[1], q[2], q[3])
60  position = Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
61  init_pose = Pose(position=position, orientation=orientation)
62  init_poses = [init_pose for i in range(self.n)]
63 
64  self.init_poses = init_poses
65  self.req = SpawnModelRequest()
66  self.req.model_xml = xml_string
67 
68  def spawn(self):
69  """
70  Spawns the IMU model with the poses defined earlier in
71  `__init__`
72  """
73  for model_name, pose in zip(self.model_names, self.init_poses):
74  try:
75  self.req.model_name = model_name
76  init_pose = Pose()
77  init_pose.position.x = pose.position[0]
78  init_pose.position.y = pose.position[1]
79  init_pose.position.z = pose.position[2] # + 0.91488
80  init_pose.orientation.x = pose.orientation[0]
81  init_pose.orientation.y = pose.orientation[1]
82  init_pose.orientation.z = pose.orientation[2]
83  init_pose.orientation.w = pose.orientation[3]
84  self.req.initial_pose = init_pose
85  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
86  self.spawn_model(self.req)
87  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
88  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
89 
90  def set_poses(self, names, poses):
91  """
92  Sets the poses of the IMU.
93 
94  Arguments
95  ---------
96  `names`: `List[str]`
97  The names of the IMUs
98 
99  `poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
100  The poses of the IMUs
101  """
102  for name, pose in zip(names, poses):
103  self.set_pose(name, pose)
104 
105  def set_pose(self, name, pose):
106  """
107  Sets a pose of an IMU
108 
109  Arguments
110  ---------
111  `name`: `str`
112  The name of the IMU
113 
114  `poses`: `geometry_msgs.msg.Pose`
115  The pose of the IMU
116  """
117  init_pose = Pose()
118  init_pose.position.x = pose.position[0]
119  init_pose.position.y = pose.position[1]
120  init_pose.position.z = pose.position[2] # + 0.91488
121  init_pose.orientation.x = pose.orientation[0]
122  init_pose.orientation.y = pose.orientation[1]
123  init_pose.orientation.z = pose.orientation[2]
124  init_pose.orientation.w = pose.orientation[3]
125  if self.sdf:
126  try:
127  state_msg = ModelState()
128  state_msg.model_name = name
129  state_msg.pose = init_pose
130  state_msg.reference_frame = "world"
131  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
132  self.set_model_state(state_msg)
133  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
134  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
135  else:
136  try:
137  link_msg = LinkState()
138  link_msg.link_name = name
139  link_msg.pose = init_pose
140  link_msg.reference_frame = "world"
141  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_link_state')
142  self.set_link_state(state_msg)
143  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
144  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
145 
146 
147 class TrueIMUBoxStateManager():
148  def __init__(self, names):
149  """
150  TrueIMUBoxStateManager class.
151 
152  Arguments
153  ---------
154  `names`: `List[str]`
155  The names of the IMUs
156  """
157  self.names = names
158  self.n = len(names)
159 
160  self.get_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/get_link_state', GetLinkState)
161  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/get_link_state')
162 
163  def get_poses(self):
164  """
165  Gets the poses of the given links
166 
167  """
168  poses = np.zeros((self.n, 7))
169  for i, name in enumerate(self.names):
170  resp = self.get_link_state(name, 'world')
171  if resp.success:
172  pose = resp.link_state.pose
173  poses[i, :] = np.r_[pose.position, pose.orientation]
174 
175  return poses
176 
177 
178 def parse_pickle_data(pickle_filename):
179  """
180  parses pickle data.
181  """
182  data = pickle.load(open(pickle_filename, 'r'))
183  trials = data['trials']
184  keys = trials.keys()
185  dh_params_data = []
186  for key in keys:
187  if len(dh_params_data) != trials[key]['imu_num']:
188  dh_params_data.append([])
189  dh_params_data[-1].append(trials[key]['position'] + trials[key]['orientation'])
190 
191  return dh_params_data
192 
193 
194 if __name__ == '__main__':
195  rospy.init_node("set_estimated_imu_positions")
196  # parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='IMU Spawner')
197  # parser.add_argument('-r', '--robot', type=str, default='panda',
198  # help="Currently only 'panda' and 'sawyer' are supported")
199  # parser.add_argument('-p', '--picklepath', type=str, default='panda_OM.pickle',
200  # help="Path to pickle file from within the data directory.")
201  # parser.add_argument('-f', '--frequency', type=float, default=50.0,
202  # help='Frequency at which the animation occurs.')
203  # args = parser.parse_args()
204  robot = 'panda'
205  # data from corresponding method
206  filename = 'panda_OM.pickle'
207 
208  frequency = 50.0
209  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
210  load_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'data', filename)
211 
212  if os.path.exists(load_path):
213  dh_params_data = parse_pickle_data(load_path)
214  else:
215  raise EnvironmentError("File not found!")
216  # dh_params_data shape is (num_su, optimization_steps, dh_params)
217  if robot == 'panda':
218  controller = PandaController()
219  elif robot == 'sawyer':
220  controller = SawyerController()
221  else:
222  raise ValueError("Must be either panda or sawyer")
223 
224  positions = np.array([0, 0, 0, -0.0698, 0, 0, 0])
225  controller.publish_positions(positions, sleep=1)
226  imu_names = ['imu_link0', 'imu_link1', 'imu_link2',
227  'imu_link3', 'imu_link4', 'imu_link5', 'imu_link6']
228  link_names = ['panda::' + imu_name for imu_name in imu_names]
229  panda_imu_manager = TrueIMUBoxStateManager(link_names)
230  defined_poses = panda_imu_manager.get_poses()
231  # Set initial poses
232  # dh_params_data shape is (num_su, optimization_steps, dh_params)
233  r = rospy.Rate(frequency)
234  n_imu = len(dh_params_data)
235  model_names = ['imu%i' % (i+1) for i in range(n_imu)]
236 
237  poses = np.zeros((n_imu, 7))
238  init_poses = [Pose(position=pose[:3], orientation=pose[3:]) for pose in poses]
239  state_manager = EstimatedIMUBoxStateManager(model_names, init_poses)
240  state_manager.spawn()
241  optimization_lengths = []
242  for su_idx, val in enumerate(dh_params_data):
243  optimization_lengths.append(len(dh_params_data[su_idx]))
244 
245  optimization_lengths = np.array(optimization_lengths)
246  indices = [0] * 6
247  su_idx = 0
248  done_amt = 0
249 
250  while True:
251  if indices[su_idx] == optimization_lengths[su_idx]:
252  # skip su.
253  pass
254  else:
255  pose = dh_params_data[su_idx][indices[su_idx]]
256  pose = Pose(position=pose[:3], orientation=pose[3:])
257  state_manager.set_pose(model_names[su_idx], pose)
258 
259  indices[su_idx] += 1
260  if indices[su_idx] == optimization_lengths[su_idx]:
261  done_amt += 1
262  if done_amt == n_imu:
263  break
264  su_idx += 1
265  su_idx %= n_imu
266  print('Optimization steps for imus:', indices)
267  r.sleep()
268 
269  # error = np.linalg.norm(defined_poses - poses)
270  # print(error)
